header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Cooking, working out, food preparation, cleaning, childhood, travelling

body.u: so when we cook is this from memory?
yeah this is actually a recipe I just made up
oh

and I normally do it with lamb and but we have beef so and I don't normally do mashed potatoes stuffed peppers but there's potatoes and there's peppers so consider doing it with rice but then I had to buy rice and we've already got potatoes
when I do potatoes with curry for like the customer I get lazy with peeling them if they're small potatoes
yeah
cut them and boil them
it's a bit of a pain in the bum
is it that bad? and then with the skin on them

erm depending on what you're eating if I just had mashed potato I'd actually prefer it with skin on it but not all of the skin I'd probably cut off like half of the skin and then when I mash it it's got the skin in it it's good it's got more flavour and then the more nutrients are usually in the skin
yeah but surely it's like a darker colour?
yeah well like what I'm making today I probably I don't want to leave any of the skin and the mash potato I'm going to make with erm ginger and red onions and erm maybe a bit of nutmeg
sounds good ah where is the skin
I like these bowls
ah
they're really nice
I don't actually like those ones that much this is my favourite
because they're difficult to clean?
yeah I like these ones
which ones?
these big ones
ah yeah they're cool nice how mum would always leave this terrible pan
yeah I know
I guess they cooked last night we should've washed up oh you did wash up you left it
huh?
you washed up last night didn't you so I guess you left it
ah yeah I left that one in the sink soaking
it doesn't soak
yeah
I never really wash up at home
does do the wash up?
does it
oh do you dry? or do you just leave it drain?
we just leave it drain I'd rather cook or do something else
cooking's more interesting

erm I do wash up though I mean quite often as well I'm cooking when 's not around and then I if I have to wash up things as I go along so although she claims that I never do any washing up that's actually a lie I do a bit of washing up just not the same as she does
yeah
but then she never cooks
does she never cook?
no not really she's cooked on occasion when she has like wanted to she's wanted to do something special for everyone but
so she knows how to cook
yeah
she just chooses not
and I mean saying she never cooks is a lie because she always cooks with me she's like sous chef
yeah
I'm in charge of like well I just go along with the recipe I know what's going on but I just tell her what to do you know
oh
she's good at making she's good at baking and she like makes the bread and stuff did you get on with her?
with ?
yeah
yeah she's cool like whenever you weren't around and we were together we we'd chat
you got along?
yeah
she's a nice girl
this is just a pain in the arse this
you should use the metal
yeah I was using it I think I'm just going to leave that for now and have another go another day
it's going to need doing though eventually
oh this thing
yes so when you're in and you go in to the gym like what was your routine to build muscle?
said I didn't really put on much muscle
no you you did because when you left you were kind of skinny and then you came back and you were quite buff
yeah
and then you went travelling erm to India or no it was to
it's the last time I came back I was kind of muscly
no the last time when you came back from erm America South America you were real skinny
but now I'm more muscular
well also yeah

I can't get much bigger it's kind of sad doesn't matter how much I work out this is just about as big as I get I don't eat protein shakes or anything I don't I guess I just ate more probably this is just my natural build
yeah
but like when we're travelling a lot I wasn't really eating that much and I was doing a lot of exercise so that was probably not a natural
yeah so like how much exercise were you doing?
right the la the last year or two?
just like when you were in your peak
four to five hours a week
that's quite a lot
erm
is that ah every day or every other day?
I tried to do weekdays and I do an hour a day
yeah

erm but I mean at my peak it could have been more because and I would go in the last year not the most recent year but the year before we were going hiking every other weekend and when you go hiking you're doing like six hours of exercise like in one go
yeah

it's not as strenuous as like you know weights or something but it's not it's not too easy so I don't know but on average i'd say four to five hours a week probably go running once or twice or hiking and then go to the gym a couple of times
so you do ah free weights at the gym?
yeah
that's what I need to do I've got to sign up to a gym at uni ah if I sign up before I go it's like ten percent cheaper
ah it's cheap anyway isn't it?
it's not that cheap it's cheap compared to like a don't know what
the one in was cheap I know it was like a hundred and eighty pounds for the whole year or something
yeah it's about the same again
that's well cheap
it is cheap
I mean it's less than a pound a day
yeah considering
it's still a hundred and eighty quid but
yeah
I mean even if you go twice a week how much would that cost you to go twice a week? it's like fifty pence a go or something isn't it?
yeah
no no no sorry
no it would be more
fifty-two weeks so fifty-two goes into a hundred and eighty about three and a half times
uhu it's still cheap if I ah go to the gym and I'm going to want to go quite often
but you're not going to be there all the weeks are you? how close is the gym to where you're living?
ah I don't know er I'd imagine it's near the area because that's where the all the sports are
yeah worth finding out
yeah
for sure
erm
right so the first thing we need to do is get the bread
are we going to need a saucepan?
we're going to need a whole bunch of things but not immediately do you want to help me with the bread?
yeah sure
could've made breadcrumbs because we're going to make meatballs so did you ever make meatballs?
nah I didn't

I mean I'll use it I haven't got a problem it's just

oh its powerful they are too small aren't they I just think they need a better chopping board I don't see the problem with chopping on this surface how good is this blade though? this food processor

I'll take all the breadcrumbs away

do you want to help me de-crust?
yeah sure
so just take the crust off of these
so we're only wanting the crust?
no we don't want the crust

they sell it they just chop the crust off
ah never seen it?

ah that this was like forty pence or something i've been quite impressed since i've come home about how cheap the food is it's not cheap cheap but like you go in Lilds it's pretty cheap compared to

I'm just joking with you well the thing is you're going top
this is some shitty bread
yeah

it should be dry a loaf of bread you don't want it to be ah you don't want it to be like nice
yeah the problem with cheap bread is that they make it very very quickly so it hasn't actually it's not really bread
no
in a traditional sense

well I think like they use enzymes to partially break down the bread so it's easier to digest
oh ok
but these are really manufactured and just not good
I try not to eat much bread
yeah me too
in general I never and I never bought a loaf of bread in really k we'd eat tortillas a bit though a little bit

they're tasty
when you're complaining about that I know that wasn't co oh yeah that was corn

corn as in like corn you know maize they use it to there's something wrong here

so then I just take a handful and then I leave it

do you know what I mean?
that keeps for a while?
yeah I mean once you've frozen it it will keep for six months
you could use it quicker than that
right cool a lot of breadcrumbs should we quickly clean this side just wipe this shit off

can't accept it
ah shit but it's just a word isn't it? linguists aren't particular about the words that they use

yes
I'll just cane it good idea

what's?

like an hour or something? right now I need an even bigger bowl like a really big bowl like a mix

they just got they've used it yet

just the bigger the bowl
here you go

yeah it's good today

this one chop up

no mate just chop it up as small as you can

yeah I like it when it works and I make a nice meal
yeah comes out tasty it's annoying when you go to all that effort
and it's rubbish
oh this tastes like crap

ah salt and pepper
oh forgot there was a lid on it oh can I get this to work? there's some big chunks of pepper corn coming out now what is this? pink Himalayan salt?
it's good salt

going to be a little while but you can do that while I'm getting on with something else

I'm going to have to do lunch then
cool what are you going to do for lunch?
don't know yet maybe do an omelette
I had a sausage sandwich earlier it was good there's two more sausages left if you want
maybe

that's pretty big

alright is this cut up enough?

cool so stick it in here

yeah cool nice cleaving now put a bunch of breadcrumbs in there and then just mix it all together basically until we get the brain
nice sounds pretty disgusting
yeah tastes good though you don't want to impress your mates with some eh burgers? yeah
not buying them

yeah
five hundred grams should be enough for the three of us shouldn't it?
I can eat five hundred grams on my own
yeah but I mean we're having quite a lot of sauce and we're going to have some peppers with mashed potatoes though do you think this might be enough?
ah should be okay
got me worried I'm sure there'll be enough food there'll be quite a few meatballs here I want to cook a rendang with you at some point
yeah
I was tempted when I go over Dad's to see if he's got any lemongrass and
I think he will do
because if he has and I think he has then we might be able to do one before we go
yeah it's a bit expensive though buying your beef I need like some proper steak you know just buy like pre-cut beef chunks or does that have to be very tender meat?
erm it's you don't really want it to be very chewy but I mean if we left it for a day it'd be alright right where's the big frying pan?
oh
is that as big as it comes? is there no other ones?
we've got a wok if that'll do?
no I need flat
right it's flat as it comes

nope
must have taken it with them
they've taken it?
oh bugger that's no good
unless you can wait

yeah that's no good
yeah so you're making bacon?
I'll do bacon eggs I'll put some veg in and make some kind of omelette
cool right so we've got the brain
what do you think of the tea?
yeah it's good I like it actually got the brain good good
it does look like a brain
yeah it does doesn't it? every time I make it I'm like it's the brain and now for meatballs you just want to make them into balls so you excited about going to uni?
yes time's going to fly by down there
it really is going to fly by isn't it?
yeah
it's good that you've got your accommodation agreement
yeah
that's a relief it's quite exciting when you get that kind of information
yeah it was more exciting when I got accepted
yeah well when you got back? when you got back from
yeah and I got
did you get the grades you were hoping for in the end? what was your final grade?
ah like ninety percent
ah I need that celery mate
all of it?
yeah I need all of it
oh bugger
I didn't know you were going to use it
no I don't have to use it
erm no I don't you can use the stalk
one?
yeah use one how much does that leave me with? there's no leaves on this thing is there what's that all about? how much does that leave?
you've got like ah four stalks
okay yeah you can use one is that alright?
yeah yeah
well I'm glad I caught you particularly you didn't want to cook me any food
you can have some of this if you want?
you might want to stick an extra rasher in you know I did have a sausage sandwich but it was about three or four hours ago
I'll just put a bunch of eggs in I'm going to make this how I make it it's not especially tasty
ah I'm sure it's good mate
I actually mix it in with rice as well
cool whatever you've made if I could just have a little bit of it I'll be pleased
right
what's your favourite thing that you cook?
probably the curries at the moment
yeah?
when they go well they're quite nice
I need chilli now to make a proper proper sauces once you know how to do it it's easy you just need the ingredients
yeah
and once you buy a pack of tamarind you only need a little bit so you've got like loads of tamarind
yeah I did try and
like that special galangal or whatever it's cal
galangal
galangal
as I said just replace it with erm ginger
yeah
it's basically the same thing it's a type of ginger
it's just a special type of ginger?
but it still tastes fine I could never get peanut oil you know or coconut oil
coconut oil is easy to get here
yeah it's not in erm it's not in for some reason I don't know why oh it's looking good how often do you eat celery then?
erm well whenever we have it like sometimes I'll buy it but mum usually puts celery in stock
yeah
and I think it's kind of tasty so
it is tasty isn't it?
sometimes I'll have leek as well
yeah leek's good I've noticed in England they don't have the leaves
no
like they cut the tops and the heads off
yeah
in Korea and I I found one day do you like cilantro? coriander?
yeah kind of
I googled one day I didn't have coriander and I was like what could you use instead of coriander? and this guy t said on this website to use the leaves of celery
oh
and I started doing it it's really flavoursome cos normally actually when I make this meatballs dish I don't use the stalks of celery I use the leaves
mm
with a bit of the stalk they're quite pungent
I've never tried it
it's good and they don't sell them here so pointless you're gonna be well sought after when you go to uni surely
why cos I?
travelling mature student knows how to cook
perhaps we'll see
yeah definitely
mm
if you get out there and start cutting up real ingredients and stuff these nineteen-year-old children are gonna be
really impressed
people grow up pretty quickly at uni they all come in with their Pot Noodles
yeah basically I couldn't cook when I went to uni it was my mate that showed y have you met ?
yeah I have
he showed me like er he lives in by the way
yeah
he showed me a can of chopped tomatoes and said better learn how to cook
yeah our our parents never taught us to cook
no
it's a terrible life skill not to not to teach you
it's cos they couldn't cook
yeah
plain and simply
if you can't cook how are you gonna cook someone else teach someone else to cook
exactly
you can't
that's why we never learned ambition from them
no mum said the other day she was a bit upset you kind of had a talk with her in the car or something
yeah
what was that all about? told her she was a bad parent or something?
no I wasn't saying that I was just saying like how do I go into it? erm
well don't talk about it if you don't want to
we were having a discussion like about childhood and and things like that
yeah
and I was saying to her how like she never taught me to cook or er because she was never ambitious like we didn't really get pushed to be ambitious either
no
and like I was like well you can't really teach kids things that you yourself do not possess and I suppose I was just having a bit of a moan about my childhood
yeah
or whatever cos er we had a lot of shit
we had a lot of good things as well though
we had some good things yeah
I mean we did up until the divorce like mum tried hard she did she may have done some things wrong but she tried hard every time
yeah
so no you can't say that she didn't try
I know she I'm pretty sure that she always did what she thought was best

mm but like erm what you were talking about with being ambitious? I'm actually glad personally that our parents didn't push us too much because I have friends now that they don't really have a very adult relationship with their parents because they tr still treat their parents like parents because their parents have always been in possession of them and they've always told them what to do and all that kind of thing
mm
whereas like I dunno and I have never felt any pressure so whatever we do they're proud of us whatever we achieve we've done well
mm
so it can go both ways I don't know
just obviously obviously you can tell your mum how you feel obviously but just remember that she'll carry that
yeah
she'll remember it
but the thing is like through a lot of my childhood I was depressed
yeah
like after they'd split up and I didn't really have a good time
I mean you say a lot of your childhood but they split up when you were thirteen or twelve?
yeah
you were a man by the time you were eighteen so
yeah I know bby the time I was eighteen I was okay but like thrthrough school after that
yeah
like things went bad and then they never really got better but I'm sure like a lot of that was through my own choices and decisions
yeah well it's a combination isn't it? but I mean you definitely became more introvert once they split up
yeah
but now you're out the other side now and you just have to be pleased that you came out the other side
yeah
you're okay cos it could've erm could've been worse
it took me time like
yeah
for me to get my shit together

but that's alright everyone does things at slightly different ages I was lucky I personally at the time it happened I could've gone one of two ways I could've just spiralled out been some fuck up in pretty much
yeah
erm but thankfully I didn't I went to uni and it helped quite a bit right
it's just I didn't have any direction
yeah I know but that is your own fault to a certain degree
yeah

in the west it's up to us isn't it the parents can't tell you what to do and I'm sure if mum had told you and the thing is mum did try and cour and encourage you plenty you forget of all the clubs that mum tried to sign you up to and all the things that she tried to do to get you out of your room you can't just blame her for that you didn't want to and you didn't want to come out
yeah
you were addicted to the computers it's an addiction no one blames you for that because you used it as a crutch I didn't get addicted to things as we all know
where's the? erm where's the can opener?
it should be in that drawer there I don't know can you use this this doesn't look like a normal can opener
you have to open it
what a retard did she get upset?
a little bit

yeah I mean don't worry about it I've said some horrible things over the years so problem is one thing I've learned you can't really take that back and they do remember it but it's fair to say how you feel but just bear in mind that how you feel is also your perception and she has her perception
yeah
does bother me that she seems to be making some of the same mistakes with he watches too much TV for my liking and eats too many sug too much sugar
they try and control it like
yeah I know they do
like what they did there is a lot better now kids eat nothing but sugar
no it's crap it's really bad actually I'm not the biggest fan of the way she kind of lives her life you think she'll have any more children?
probably I hope not but
hope they don't like divorce or anything that's just going to be another wrecked family it's not on but what can you do?
you can't do anything
it's people's life to live isn't it?
people's mistakes to make

say that I did have a sausage sandwich but it was a while ago did you have anything for breakfast?
I've had two bananas today that's it

badly?

isn't quite

not terrible

that's not too bad
no seeing as I mean it's like a five hour drive to so actually they should be there soon shouldn't they?
yeah I thought it would take a lot longer than that
yeah I thought so too but maybe I'm wrong I'm sure he said that to me but you would think it would be like six hours just to get through wouldn't you?
mm and then they've got to get down to southern
I don't rightly know

just have it without it's got to be good isn't it?
